alert.note: Alert for Hoke; Moore; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 31 at 11:48PM EST until January 01 at 12:45AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Moore County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Richmond County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Hoke County in central North Carolina... * Until 1245 AM EST. * At 1147 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Rockingham, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Rockingham, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Hoffman, Whispering Pines, Pinebluff, Ellerbe, Foxfire and Taylortown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a tornado warning may need to be issued.
